_sText:
Author: detamic
email: detamic@wanadoo.fr

map: cs_italy_reloaded_final

This is an optimized version of cs_italy_reloaded. In this new version, FPS are usually between 50 and 80 on my computer (around the same as official map for me) instead of 20 to 50 before optimization.
There are still little freezing time but in the first round only. 
Special thanks to SoopaFly, DJ Bourgeoisie (cs/de_xcom, de_courthouse_final...), LDuke and PAF team (from http://www.punkassfraggers.com) for their help and all the time they have spent to optimized this map. Thanks too to Boxer82003 for testing!

Action take place in a little village in italy, just before night. Counters have to rescue hostages which have been hidden in a little house by terrorists.
This is NOT a remake of cs_italy; it is a 100% new map made with part of cs_italy textures and style.
You can play up to 40 players.

cs_italy_reloaded_final.bsp, .nav and .txt can be instaled in the ...Valve\Steam\Steamapps\username\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps\
directory or in your game directory if you have change it. 

I hope you will enjoy this file!
---------------------------------
CSBANANA Special ReadMe

I have not made this super good map!
It was Detamic!
If you want to modify this map,ask detamic!
